caption: This children's song features the voices of children singing the  main melody. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. A keyboard plays the sounds of a marimba to give this song a reggae feel. The bass plays the root notes followed by a run at every chord change. This song has a happy mood. This song can be played in a children's animation movie.
